channel.title: sports on QuizInk - The e-magazine
channel.description: Recent content in sports on QuizInk - The e-magazine

item.title: What is Moneyball?
item.description: “(Signing for the NY Mets instead of going to Stanford University) is the only decision I would make in my life about money” – Billy Beane

item.title: Data Analytics in Football
item.description: “While the use of data and technical analysis has become essential for today's football clubs, the big Premier League teams aren’t the only ones playing the game nowadays. Smaller clubs are getting in on the action too, thanks to cheaper and more accessible software.”
